code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddProduct=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[newProduct,setNewProduct]=useState({name:"",price:"",description:"",image:null});const handleChange=e=>{if(e.target.name==="image"){setNewProduct({...newProduct,image:e.target.files[0]});}else{setNewProduct({...newProduct,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData();formData.append("name",newProduct.name);formData.append("price",newProduct.price);formData.append("description",newProduct.description);formData.append("image",newProduct.image);const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/products",{method:"POST",body:formData});if(res.ok){navigate("/admin/stocks");}else{console.error("Erreur lors de l'ajout du produit");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u2795 Ajouter un produit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Nom du produit",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"price",placeholder:"Prix",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"description",placeholder:"Description",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",name:"image",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Ajouter"})]})]});};export default AddProduct;
